negative_prompt: Tacos on top of a skateboard
long_prompt: A vibrantly colored taco sits within a brightly colored skateboard, with its crispy shell peeking out from beneath the deck's smooth surface.
Tacos filled with ground beef, lettuce, and cheese sit within a colorful skateboard deck, its vibrant patterns reflecting the light as it rests on a concrete surface.

A vibrant taco stand with colorful signage is set up on a custom skateboard, its wheels replaced with wooden platforms. Inside, various tacos are stacked neatly in plastic containers, with a signboard above displaying a menu in Spanish.
negative_long_prompt: Tacos with colorful toppings sit on a brightly colored skateboard, their vibrant colors and textures contrasting against the skateboard's smooth surface and wheels.
Tacos piled high with ground beef, lettuce, and cheese sit atop a colorful skateboard deck, its wheels and graphic designs adding visual interest as it rests on a concrete surface.

A classic taco stand is set up on a traditional skateboard, its wheels replaced with wooden platforms. A signboard above displays a menu in Spanish, with various tacos stacked neatly in plastic containers, and a crowd of people waiting to order.
